resources.string: Does the patient already have existing ID?
There is existing form data. Finish Incomplete data and sync Complete data to Server first before syncing form templates.
There is existing form data for selected form(s). Finish Incomplete data and sync Complete data to Server first before downloading the forms.
You do not have provider rights or your provider data is not downloaded, please use add provider option.
Already fetching forms, ignored the request
Already uploading forms, ignored the request
No connection found, please connect your device and try again
Action not allowed while sync is in progress
Wizard was interrupted, please logout and run the wizard again.
You need a barcode scanner application to register clients from mobile. Please check whether it\'s been installed in your device or not.
Your search includes client id, given name, middle name and family name and searched only in the device
Your search includes client id, given name, middle name and family name and searched only in the device
Select one or more cohorts from the list and click on \'Next\' to download
Start typing to filter the cohorts...
A cohort is a predefined group of clients for which you can fill forms and download observations. The prefix(es) set here will be used to download cohorts afterwards.
Please click on add button to add a cohort prefix
In this step of the wizard, you download the cohorts you need. Please select the cohorts and click next.
Please press load to fetch available cohorts list from server
Please select cohorts from all cohorts list and click sync
Complete forms are available only if you have filled a form completely but have not synced it with the server
Add concept(s) that you want observation(s) to be downloaded.
An unexpected error occurred forcing mUzima to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
Please add your comments about the problem below.
Here you define concepts whose data will be included in later download.
Here you download locations that will show up in the forms.
Here you download providers that will show up in the forms.
Select one or more form templates from the list and click on \'Next\' to download
Please select forms from all forms list and click download
Please press load to fetch data from server
Please select non registration forms from all forms list and click download
Incomplete forms are available only if you have saved a partially filled form
Add location(s) that you want to download.
Make sure you have connectivity to server and press the load button
Did you change your password recently?
Add provider(s) that you want to download.
No completed and non synced forms
No clients matched your search locally. Enter at least 3 characters for remote search.
No clients matched your search on server
No completed and non synced forms on device

No new location has been added yet.
No new provider has been added yet.
Barcode Scanner application is already installed.
Your session had been timed out. Please log in again to proceed.
You can add provider(s) to display in your forms.
You can add multiple cohort prefixes to restrict the cohort downloads.
Enable warning when duplicate form data for same client with same encounter date is being saved
Logged-in user as default encounter form provider
Enable real time synchronization of complete form data
Licensing, Disclaimer of Warranty and Limitation of Liability
Fill out forms for a patient
Closing Form: This will discard all your changes. Are you sure you would like to do this?
This Form Data already exists for this client with same encounter date.
Are you sure to log out and exit mUzima app?
Switching Server: This will clear all mUzima data on your device, including any incomplete forms. Are you sure you want to change this setting?
